A '''potion of Night Vision''' is a potion that provides [[Night Vision]] when used.

== Usage ==
=== Effect ===
Potions of Night Vision are used by pressing and holding {{control|use}} with the potion bottle in hand, as with all consumable items. When consumed, they give the player [[Night Vision]] and return a [[glass bottle]].

Drinking a potion while already under the effects of the same potion does not add onto the effect's duration, but simply resets it.

=== Base potion ===
Potion of Night Vision is a base for brewing [[potions of Invisibility]].
{{Brewing
|head = 1
|Fermented Spider Eye
|base = Potion of Night Vision
|Potion of Invisibility
|showvariants=1
}}
{{Brewing
|Fermented Spider Eye
|base = Potion of Night Vision Extended
|Potion of Invisibility Extended
|name = Extended [[Potion of Invisibility]]
|ingredients = [[Fermented Spider Eye]] +<br> '''Extended Potion of Night Vision'''
|showvariants=1
|foot = 1
}}
